name: Ice Climbing (drewpit)
description:
Move left and right to avoid the obstacles and guide your buddy past them, too. You and your buddy will help each other out if one of you falls, just make sure you don't both fall at the same time!

Try to get to the top!

Controls: Unity's built-in horizontal axis movement (AD of WASD or arrow keys on keyboard, presumably joystick on controllers? I only tested on keyboard)

When you lose or win or decide to stop playing, the only way to quit is to Alt+Tab out of the game and close it manually.

Key:

Game ObjectMeaningYellow cylinderYouWhite cylinderYour climbing buddyLight blue backgroundThe ice wall you are climbingDark blue patchesIce that will break after a short delayDark grey patchesIce that will break immediately

GitHub: https://github.com/apitman/Ice-Climbing-Game

Postmortem: https://github.com/apitman/Ice-Climbing-Game/blob/main/POSTMORTEM.md
